qas.question: Which edition of the Guinness Book of World Record states that no female artist sold more records than Madonna?
Which film project did Madonna leave because of differences with the director?
Who was the director of Music of the Heart?
Which film did Madonna record the single Beautiful Stranger for?
Which award did Madonna win for the single "Beautiful Stranger?"

context: The <a0_0>1998<a0_0/> edition of Guinness Book of World Records stated: "No female artist has sold more records than Madonna around the world". In 1999 Madonna signed to play a violin teacher in the film <a1_0>Music of the Heart<a1_0/> but left the project, citing "creative differences" with director <a2_0>Wes Craven<a2_0/>. She recorded the single "<a3_0>Beautiful Stranger<a3_0/>" for the 1999 film Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me. It reached number 19 on the Hot 100 solely on radio airplay. Madonna won a <a4_0>Grammy Award<a4_0/> for "Best Song Written for a Motion Picture, Television or Other Visual Media".
